description: Episode of Series "World in action". The anti-rape movement in the United States is of concern to the feminist movement. Shows the activities of rape crisis centres and in particular deals with the activities of the organisation Women Organised Against Rape, which is based in Philadelphia, and handles l,000 rape cases a year.
